content.raw:
`this->Load("worlds/shapes.world", false, false, true);` ?

I think the last arg (`_clientScene`) could also be `false` since the test is creating a MainWindow here which in turn creates a scene.
content.html:
this->Load("worlds/shapes.world", false, false, true); ?

I think the last arg (_clientScene) could also be false since the test is creating a MainWindow here which in turn creates a scene.
